metadata.synopsis: Several poems and plays can be found at Arcane Tower. Each contains a passphrase for Automaton. To attract player's attention to this fact and give a slight hint, player's character has this small remark after reading first of these fine pieces. The dialog must not explicitly point that there's a passphrase in the piece, rather just comment freely on the taste of the wizard who read them.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Seems like the owner was quite the literary type.
